name: Hibiki Finance
description: Hibiki is a multichain project that provides token development tools and NFT games along with LP token staking. Current features include a Liquidity Pool locker and the first Hibiki NFT collection - 9001 AI generated anime girl NFTs which you can use for PVE and PVP fights with play to earn mechanics. Additonally, Hibiki has a suite of other tools under development, including a multichain block explorer and an easy to use token creation system. The entire Hibiki ecosystem will be powered by the Hibiki token, powered by the Binance Smart Chain.
